title: Political will
effect: Cannot be stopped. Each card costs +1 (any resource)

title: Party discipline
effect: Each turn in the 2nd segment the player can trade 3 of any resource for 1 move

title: Moral principles
effect: Can't be put more than 1 off target. Can't play cards that drain morality

title: Knowing the secrets of others
effect: Each attack card costs the attacker +1 popularity

title: Wealth
effect: Can use any resource instead of financial resources

title: Negotiation skills
effect: Lose 1 less resource (of choice) when an attacker plays  a card.

title: Ties with the media
effect: Instead of playing a card, can trade 1 morality for 1 move forward

title: Party leadership favorite
effect: Cards that stop you or move you off target cost +1 of the attacker's choice

title: Team recruitment skills
effect: Each attack card costs the attacker +1 capacity
